pages.text: For primary generators, right-click the controller in JEI to view the multi-cube structure diagram. If you have enough building cubes on you, use the wooden stick to right-click the controller to build it quickly. Input magma to generate 100 FE per tick; input diamond to generate 250 FE per tick; input coal to generate 159 FE per tick; input molten flesh to generate 300 FE per tick.

Advanced generator, right click on the controller in JEI to view the multi-cube structure diagram. If you have enough building cubes on you, you can build them quickly by using the wooden stick and right-clicking the controller. Input magma to generate 200 FE per tick; input diamond to generate 1000 FE per tick; input coal to generate 400 FE per tick; input molten flesh to generate 1200 FE per tick.
